segments.text: Come back . You haven't paid yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But he took some newspaper away without paying .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He lives nearby and he would just glance at the newspaper headlines , read the political sections and return them later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why does he have such a privilege ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He used to be a hero during the war time and everyone respect him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Does he live by himself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he has no children and his wife passed away when he was in the battle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bet . But he is always busy telling the children stories .
segments.speaker: S2
